identity.name: Apple Inc.
identity.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories worldwide. It also sells related services, including AppleCare support, cloud services, and digital content and payment services.
identity.headquarters:
ONE APPLE PARK WAY
CUPERTINO, CA 95014

competitors.name: Samsung Electronics
competitors.description: Samsung Electronics is a global leader in consumer electronics, semiconductors, and mobile communications. It produces a wide range of products including smartphones, TVs, home appliances, and memory chips.
competitors.advantages: Broad product portfolio across consumer electronics and components, strong presence in emerging markets, significant investment in R&D for display and semiconductor technologies.

competitors.name: Alphabet Inc. (Google)
competitors.description: Alphabet Inc. is a multinational technology conglomerate with a wide range of products and services, including search engines, online advertising technologies, cloud computing, software, and hardware. Its most well-known subsidiary is Google.
competitors.advantages: Dominance in search and online advertising, extensive cloud infrastructure and AI capabilities, strong ecosystem of software and services (Android, Google Workspace).

competitors.name: Microsoft Corporation
competitors.description: Microsoft Corporation is a technology company that develops, licenses, and supports a wide range of software products, services, and devices. Its offerings include the Windows operating system, Office productivity suite, Azure cloud services, and Xbox gaming consoles.
competitors.advantages: Strong enterprise software and cloud presence (Azure, Microsoft 365), dominant position in PC operating systems, diversified revenue streams across software, hardware, and services.

competitors.name: Amazon.com, Inc.
competitors.description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an e-commerce giant that also operates a leading cloud computing platform (Amazon Web Services - AWS), digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It offers a vast array of products and services.
competitors.advantages: Unrivaled e-commerce scale and logistics, dominant cloud computing market share (AWS), strong ecosystem of digital services and devices (Echo, Kindle).

competitors.name: Meta Platforms, Inc.
competitors.description: Meta Platforms, Inc. is a technology company focused on building social technologies that enable people to connect, find communities, and grow businesses. Its platforms include Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus.
competitors.advantages: Massive global user base across its social media platforms, significant investment in virtual and augmented reality (Metaverse), strong advertising revenue model.
